English: hero of the day (birthday boy / girl)
My birthday is on the 17th of January.

Finnish: Kuinka monta vuotta täytät tänä vuonna?
English: How old will you be this year?
How many years are "on the meter"?

Hungarian: Tegnap töltöttem be a kerek évet.

English: Congratulations to the birthday boy / girl!
Thanks so much for the congratulations!
Would you come celebrate my birthday?
Will you come to my birthday party?
Welcome to my birthday party Jan 17th!

Finnish: Tarjolla on pientä suolaista ja makeaa.
English: There will be some small sweet and savory snacks.
Hungarian: Lesznek kis édes és sós falatok.

Finnish: Miten vuosi voi mennä näin äkkiä?
English: How can a year go this fast?
Hungarian: Hogyan telhet el egy év ilyen gyorsan?

English: I'm sorry, I forgot your birthday.
Here's a small gift for you.
There are many candles on the cake.
Hungarian: A születésnapi tortán sok gyertya van.

English: Soon there will be reason to party.
The 80th birthday party will be at home.
I will spend my birthday casually at home.
I don't make a big deal out of my birthday.
Hungarian: Nem csinálok nagy ügyet a születésnapomból.
